1 import rospy

3 from .robot_status_enums import *
4 from .robot_status_observer import RobotStatusObserver
5 from .robot_nodes_observer import RobotNodesObserver
6 from .robot_logs_observer import RobotLogsObserver

8 # - Messages
9 from std_msgs.msg import Empty
10 from niryo_robot_status.msg import RobotStatus
11 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import HardwareStatus
12 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
13 from niryo_robot_arm_commander.msg import PausePlanExecution

15 # - Services
16 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import AdvertiseShutdown, AdvertiseShutdownRequest

18 
19 class NoChangesException(Exception):
20  pass
21 
22 
23 class RobotStatusHandler(object):
24 
25  def __init__(self):
26  self.__robot_status = RobotStatus.BOOTING
27  self.__robot_message = ""
28  self.__booting = True
29  self.__autonomous_mode = False
30  self.__robot_status_pub = None
31 
32  # - Observers
33  self.__robot_nodes_observer = RobotNodesObserver(self)
34  self.__robot_status_observer = RobotStatusObserver(self)
35  self.__robot_logs_observer = RobotLogsObserver(self)
36 
37  # - Publisher
38  self.__robot_status_pub = rospy.Publisher('~robot_status', RobotStatus, latch=True, queue_size=10)
39  self.__robot_heartbeat_pub = rospy.Publisher('~heartbeat', Empty, queue_size=1)
40  rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(1), lambda _: self.__robot_heartbeat_pub.publish())
41 
42  # - Services
43  self.__advertise_shutdown_service = rospy.Service('~advertise_shutdown',
44  AdvertiseShutdown,
45  self.__callback_advertise_shutdown)
46 
47  # - Handle shutdown
48  rospy.on_shutdown(self.__shutdown_advertise)
49 
50  # Init Status
51  self.__autonomous_mode = self.get_autonomous_status()
52  self.__build_robot_status()
53  self.__waiting_for_booting()
54  self.__robot_status_observer.read_joint_limits()
55 
56  @property
57  def robot_status(self):
58  return self.__robot_status
59 
60  def __callback_advertise_shutdown(self, req):
61  if req.value == AdvertiseShutdownRequest.SHUTDOWN:
62  self.__shutdown_advertise(RobotStatus.SHUTDOWN)
63  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success"
64  elif req.value == AdvertiseShutdownRequest.REBOOT:
65  self.__shutdown_advertise(RobotStatus.REBOOT)
66  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success"
67  elif req.value == AdvertiseShutdownRequest.UPDATE:
68  self.__shutdown_advertise(RobotStatus.UPDATE)
69  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success"
70 
71  return CommandStatus.FAILURE, "Bad arguments"
72 
73  def __waiting_for_booting(self, timeout=120):
74  self.__booting = True
75  self.__build_robot_status()
76 
77  rate = rospy.Rate(2)
78  start_time = rospy.Time.now()
79  while self.__booting and not rospy.is_shutdown():
80  if self.__robot_status_observer.hardware_status is not None \
81  and self.__robot_status_observer.hardware_status.connection_up:
82 
83  self.__booting = not self.__robot_nodes_observer.check_nodes_initialization()
84 
85  if self.__booting:
86  if (rospy.Time.now() - start_time).to_sec() > timeout:
87  self.__booting = False
88  break
89  elif self.__robot_nodes_observer.missing_vital_nodes:
90  booting_message = "Missing nodes: {}".format(self.__robot_nodes_observer.missing_vital_nodes)
91  else:
92  booting_message = "Not initialized nodes: {}".format(
93  self.__robot_nodes_observer.not_initialized_nodes)
94  if booting_message != self.__robot_message:
95  self.__robot_message = booting_message
96  self.__publish()
97  rate.sleep()
98 
99  rospy.loginfo('\033[5;34;1m\\(^-^)/ \033[3mRobot ready to receive commands! \033[0;5;34;1m\\(^-^)/\033[0m')
100 
101  self.__robot_message = ""
102  self.__build_robot_status()
103  self.__robot_nodes_observer.start_nodes_check_loop() # Start nodes checker observer
104 
105  def get_autonomous_status(self):
106  return self.__robot_nodes_observer.check_user_node or \
107  self.__robot_status_observer.program_is_running or \
108  self.__robot_status_observer.is_tcp_client_connected or \
109  self.__robot_nodes_observer.pyniryo_connected
110 
111  def advertise_new_state(self):
112  if self.__robot_status_pub is not None:
113  self.__build_robot_status()
114 
115  def advertise_new_logs(self):
116  if self.__robot_status_pub is not None and self.__robot_status > RobotStatus.SHUTDOWN:
117  self.__publish()
118 
119  def advertise_warning(self):
120  if self.__robot_status_pub is not None:
121  self.__publish()
122 
123  def __shutdown_advertise(self, status=RobotStatus.SHUTDOWN):
124  self.__robot_status = status
125  self.__robot_message = ROBOT_STATUS_TO_MESSAGE[status]
126  self.__booting = False
127  self.__log_status = RobotStatus.NONE
128  self.__log_msg = ""
129  self.__publish()
130 
131  def __build_robot_status(self):
132  try:
133 
134  new_robot_status, new_robot_message = self.__check_estop_state()
135 
136  if new_robot_status == RobotStatus.UNKNOWN:
137  # - Ros status -> Booting, Node crash, etc..
138  new_robot_status, new_robot_message = self.__check_ros_state()
139 
140  if new_robot_status == RobotStatus.UNKNOWN:
141  # Motor Error
142  new_robot_status, new_robot_message = self.__check_hardware_error()
143 
144  if new_robot_status == RobotStatus.UNKNOWN:
145  # - Program or motion errors
146  new_robot_status, new_robot_message = self.__check_motion_errors()
147 
148  if new_robot_status == RobotStatus.UNKNOWN:
149  # - Robot status - No errors
150  new_robot_status, new_robot_message = self.__check_regular_robot_status()
151  except NoChangesException:
152  return
153 
154  if self.__robot_status != new_robot_status or self.__robot_message != new_robot_message:
155  self.__robot_status = new_robot_status
156  self.__robot_message = new_robot_message
157  self.__publish()
158 
159  def __publish(self):
160  robot_status_msg = RobotStatus()
161 
162  robot_status_msg.robot_status = self.__robot_status
163  robot_status_msg.robot_status_str = ROBOT_STATUS_TO_STR[robot_status_msg.robot_status]
164  robot_status_msg.robot_message = self.__robot_message
165 
166  robot_status_msg.logs_status = self.__robot_logs_observer.log_status
167  robot_status_msg.logs_status_str = LOG_STATUS_TO_STR[robot_status_msg.logs_status]
168  robot_status_msg.logs_message = self.__robot_logs_observer.log_message
169 
170  robot_status_msg.out_of_bounds = self.__robot_status_observer.out_of_bounds
171  robot_status_msg.rpi_overheating = self.__robot_status_observer.rpi_overheating
172 
173  self.__robot_status_pub.publish(robot_status_msg)
174 
175  if RobotStatus.SHUTDOWN < robot_status_msg.robot_status < RobotStatus.NONE:
176  rospy.logwarn("[Robot Status] - {} - {}".format(robot_status_msg.robot_status_str,
177  robot_status_msg.robot_message))
178 
179  def __check_estop_state(self):
180  new_robot_status = RobotStatus.UNKNOWN
181  new_robot_message = ""
182 
183  if self.__robot_status_observer.estop_detected:
184  new_robot_status = RobotStatus.ESTOP
185  new_robot_message = "Emergency stop triggered"
186 
187  return new_robot_status, new_robot_message
188 
189  def __check_hardware_error(self):
190  new_robot_status = RobotStatus.UNKNOWN
191  new_robot_message = ""
192 
193  if HardwareStatus.REBOOT == self.__robot_status_observer.hardware_status.hardware_state:
194  new_robot_status, new_robot_message = RobotStatus.REBOOT_MOTOR, "Rebooting one or more motors"
195  elif self.__robot_status_observer.hardware_status.error_message or \
196  HardwareStatus.ERROR == self.__robot_status_observer.hardware_status.hardware_state:
197  new_robot_status = RobotStatus.MOTOR_ERROR
198  new_robot_message = self.__robot_status_observer.hardware_status.error_message
199  else:
200  for motor_index, motor_error in enumerate(
201  self.__robot_status_observer.hardware_status.hardware_errors_message):
202  if motor_error and not (motor_index > 5 and motor_error == "Overload"):
203  new_robot_status = RobotStatus.MOTOR_ERROR
204  new_robot_message += "{}: {}\n".format(
205  self.__robot_status_observer.hardware_status.motor_names[motor_index], motor_error)
206 
207  return new_robot_status, new_robot_message
208 
209  def __check_regular_robot_status(self):
210  self.__autonomous_mode = self.get_autonomous_status()
211  if self.__robot_status_observer.hardware_status.calibration_in_progress:
212  robot_status = RobotStatus.CALIBRATION_IN_PROGRESS
213  elif self.__robot_status_observer.hardware_status.calibration_needed:
214  robot_status = RobotStatus.CALIBRATION_NEEDED
215  elif self.__robot_status_observer.learning_trajectory:
216  robot_status = RobotStatus.LEARNING_TRAJECTORY
217  elif self.__robot_status_observer.learning_mode_state and not self.__autonomous_mode:
218  robot_status = RobotStatus.LEARNING_MODE
219  elif self.__robot_status_observer.pause_state == PausePlanExecution.PAUSE:
220  robot_status = RobotStatus.PAUSE
221  elif self.__robot_status_observer.is_debug_motor_active:
222  robot_status = RobotStatus.RUNNING_DEBUG
223  elif self.__autonomous_mode:
224  if self.__robot_status_observer.learning_mode_state:
225  robot_status = RobotStatus.LEARNING_MODE_AUTONOMOUS
226  else:
227  robot_status = RobotStatus.RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS
228  elif self.__robot_status_observer.motion_goal_is_active or self.__robot_status_observer.jog_is_enabled:
229  robot_status = RobotStatus.MOVING
230  # waiting for user intervention to clear these errors
231  elif self.__robot_status not in [RobotStatus.COLLISION, RobotStatus.USER_PROGRAM_ERROR]:
232  robot_status = RobotStatus.STANDBY
233  else:
234  raise NoChangesException
235 
236  return robot_status, ROBOT_STATUS_TO_MESSAGE[robot_status]
237 
238  def __check_motion_errors(self):
239  # - Program or motion errors
240  if self.__robot_status_observer.collision_detected:
241  robot_status, robot_message = RobotStatus.COLLISION, ROBOT_STATUS_TO_MESSAGE[RobotStatus.COLLISION]
242  self.__robot_status_observer.collision_detected = False
243  elif self.__robot_status == RobotStatus.COLLISION and self.__robot_status_observer.program_error:
244  # Stay at collision status
245  raise NoChangesException
246  elif self.__robot_status_observer.program_error:
247  robot_status = RobotStatus.USER_PROGRAM_ERROR
248  robot_message = self.__robot_status_observer.program_error_message
249  else:
250  robot_status, robot_message = RobotStatus.UNKNOWN, ""
251 
252  return robot_status, robot_message
253 
254  def __check_ros_state(self):
255  if self.__robot_status <= RobotStatus.SHUTDOWN:
256  raise NoChangesException
257  elif self.__booting:
258  robot_status, robot_message = RobotStatus.BOOTING, ROBOT_STATUS_TO_MESSAGE[RobotStatus.BOOTING]
259  elif not self.__robot_nodes_observer.are_vital_nodes_alive:
260  robot_status = RobotStatus.FATAL_ERROR
261  robot_message = "{} nodes are missing".format(self.__robot_nodes_observer.missing_vital_nodes)
262  else:
263  robot_status, robot_message = RobotStatus.UNKNOWN, ""
264 
265  return robot_status, robot_message
